Reposition Malefactor

Pulls the creature 9m closer to you.

Reposition Malefactor is a Weapon Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Reposition Malefactor lets you pulls foes closer to you. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.
